# Triggerbot Configuration File
# This file is automatically generated and loaded on startup
# You can manually edit these values or use the program's configuration menu

# Timing settings
delay=50

# Detection settings
detectionRadius=5

# Crosshair position (usually center of screen)
crosshairX=960
crosshairY=540

# Enemy color thresholds (RGB values)
# Purple enemies (Valorant-style: RGB 240, 90, 255 with tolerance)
enemyColorRedMin=220
enemyColorRedMax=255
enemyColorGreenMin=70
enemyColorGreenMax=110
enemyColorBlueMin=235
enemyColorBlueMax=255

# Notes:
# - delay: Milliseconds between shots (lower = faster firing)
# - detectionRadius: Pixels around crosshair to check for enemies
# - crosshairX/Y: Screen coordinates of crosshair center
# - enemyColor*: RGB thresholds for detecting enemy colors
#   Adjust these based on your game's enemy highlighting colors
